logIn(String, String) - Method in class dao.db.CompanyDaoDb
the logIn method will return true if we get a result it mean the query is true to get company from the database
logIn(String, String) - Method in class dao.db.CustomerDaoDb
in the logIn if there any result from the database its true because a customer returned from the table.

logIn(String, String) - Method in class facade.CustomerFacade
in this log in method we save the customer (that logged in )id so he or she can use all the other methods of the facade without retype the id every time .
Login(String, String, ClientType) - Method in class singleton.CouponSystem
user can get facade access to his user according to his client Type .
LogIn - Class in webServices
 
LogIn() - Constructor for class webServices.LogIn
 
logOut(HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.Admin_Rest_Facade
to make shore that no one is using the facade directly with the url (without login first) we put the facade on the session in the log in and remove it in the log out (the filter will stop users without facade on there session).
